title: Smart Data Models - PFVArType1IEEEPFController
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE PF Controller Type 1 which operates by moving the voltage reference directly.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 11.2.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PFVArType1IEEEPFController

ovex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Overexcitation Flag () true = overexcited false = underexcited. Default: False

tpfc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PF controller time delay ().  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

vitmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum machine terminal current needed to enable pf/var controller (). Default: 0.0

vpf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Synchronous machine power factor (). Default: 0.0

vpfcbw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PF controller dead band ().  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

vpfref.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PF controller reference (). Default: 0.0

vvtmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum machine terminal voltage needed for pf/var controller to be enabled (). Default: 0.0

vvtmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum machine terminal voltage needed to enable pf/var controller (). Default: 0.0
